dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.context
Interface IContext

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractContext, ECUConfigContext, ModuleConfigContext, SystemConfigContext
public interface IContext

This is the public interface to set and query a selection context. This context interface is used by GuidedConfiguration triggers and wizards to manage if a trigger or wizard is visible and enabled. The selection context stores attributes about the current environment.

Available contexts

Tresos Studio already has two selection contexts which can be queried:
  • ECUConfigContext ID(ECUConfigContext): The selection context of the current ECU configuration project.
  • ModuleConfigContext ID(ModuleConfigContext): The selection context of the current module configuration.
They can be either accessed as singleton class: 
 ECUConfigContext.getInstance();
or via ContextManager 
 ContextManager.getInstance().getContext( ID )

Where ID is the unique id of the context.

Context manages lists of tag/value attributes that describe the properties of the context (e.g. Project Name of currently selected project...). These attributes can be referenced for example in the visiblity equations of triggers.

2008.b
